alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:38PM CDT until April 20 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sangamon County in central Illinois... Southeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 438 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located Alexander, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... New Berlin around 445 PM CDT. Loami around 450 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sherman, Riverton and Williamsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 78 and 109. Interstate 72 between mile markers 69 and 70, and between mile markers 72 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
